statements: SELECT user_id, access_level FROM user_permissions;
SELECT access_level, user_id FROM user_permissions;
SELECT * FROM user_permissions WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM user_permissions WHERE access_level > 2;
SELECT user_id, access_level FROM user_permissions ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, access_level FROM user_permissions WHERE access_level > 5;
SELECT * FROM user_permissions WHERE user_id = 100 ORDER BY access_level DESC;
SELECT COUNT(user_id) AS total_users FROM user_permissions WHERE access_level = 3;
SELECT user_id, access_level FROM user_permissions WHERE access_level IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY access_level ASC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(access_level) AS total_access_levels FROM user_permissions GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_access_levels > 1;
SELECT user_id, access_level FROM user_permissions WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT access_level, user_id FROM user_permissions WHERE access_level = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM role_permissions WHERE role_id = 3;
SELECT permission, role_id FROM role_permissions WHERE permission LIKE '%read%';
SELECT user_id, access_level FROM user_permissions ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, access_level FROM user_permissions WHERE access_level = 'admin';
SELECT role_id, permission FROM role_permissions WHERE role_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, access_level FROM user_permissions ORDER BY access_level DESC;
SELECT role_id, permission FROM role_permissions ORDER BY role_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, access_level FROM user_permissions WHERE access_level LIKE '%read%' AND user_id > 100;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT role_name, description FROM roles WHERE role_name = 'Admin';
SELECT * FROM user_roles WHERE role_id = 2;
SELECT permission_name FROM permissions WHERE description LIKE '%read%';
SELECT * FROM users
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT * FROM roles ORDER BY role_name DESC
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM user_roles WHERE user_id = 2
SELECT permission_name FROM permissions
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT role_id, role_name FROM roles ORDER BY role_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, email, password FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u INNER JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id INNER JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username, roles.role_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%admin%';

SELECT user_id, username, roles.role_name, permissions.permission_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id JOIN permissions ON roles.role_id = permissions.permission_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE username = 'alice';
SELECT role_name FROM roles WHERE role_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM user_roles ORDER BY user_id DESC, role_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM role_permissions WHERE role_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username FROM users WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT role_name FROM roles ORDER BY role_name DESC;
SELECT permission_name FROM permissions WHERE permission_name LIKE '%read%';

SELECT u.username, r.role_name, p.permission_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id JOIN role_permissions rp ON r.role_id = rp.role_id JOIN permissions p ON rp.permission_id = p.permission_id WHERE u.username = 'john_doe';
